descriptions: ['DescriptionForest is proud to offer this Free Hold Residential Plot G+1 in La Mer South\xa0for Sale.* Ownership: Freehold* Usage: Residential Villa* 5% Down payment*\xa05 Year Payment Plan*\xa0DLD waiver*\xa05 years service charge is waiver* Access to the Beach* Permitted Height : G+1.* Plot Size : 7529 sq/ft* Average FAR : 0.65 - 0.68.* Service Charge applicable AED 1.40/ sq. ft. of land area* Early access subject to 30% payment* Resale at 60%.* Restriction on the regulations is applicable in terms of design and construction.* Main Authority - Dubai Creative Clusters AuthorityThe famous La Mer on Jumeirah Beach have freehold residential plots for sale starting from a size of 7,500 sq/ft\xa0going up to 24,000 sq/ft.\xa0La Mer is a world-class beachfront destination that incorporates trendy, minimalist design\xa0and features, an eclectic mix of casual and fine dining, leisure and entertainment, retail and\xa0hospitality experiences, as well as a residential community.Located at Jumeirah 1, between Jumeirah Bay and Pearl Jumeirah and in proximity to other\xa0Meraas destinations including City Walk and Boxpark, La Mer allows visitors and residents to\xa0experience uninterrupted views of the sea, Dubais iconic skyline and the calming sounds of the\xa0sea.Major attractions include Laguna Waterpark, Roxy Cinemas, and a collection of local and\xa0international restaurants, shops and beach-focused activities.']

["DescriptionType: 3 Bedroom
Size: 2382 Sq ft
View: Marina
Parking: 2
This apartment offers well planned and spacious 3 Bedrooms + Maids Room + Study + Dedicated Storage Room in the Basement
Trident Waterfront is a residential building which consists of two and three bedroom apartments and four bedroom waterfront villas, located on the stretch of Dubai Marina. It is available with 100% freehold property for all nationals without any exception and of course with residence visa facility.
Living in the tower, life moves in time with the surge. The fresh early morning, the breezy afternoon, the impressive sunset and the reflection of thousands of lights on the waterfront at night offers you an extraordinary view. You wil never want to close your curtains.Look out across the marina with its amazing views over the marina, yachts at anchor, and seagulls circling overhead. Beyond the marina, gaze out over the Arabian Gulf lined by palm trees, white sandy beaches and luxury hotels.
Once you've experienced to live at Trident Waterfront, luxury living will never seem the same again. Each apartment and villa has been designed to make the most of the unique location. Spacious rooms, wide balconies and large windows. Take full advantage of the sunlight and sea breezes."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionThe Address Fountain Views Tower 1
- Sky Collection
- 4 Bedroom Penthouse
- 3 Balconies
- 2742 sqft Gross
- Direct access into Dubai Mall
- Full Panoramic Views of The Burj Khalifa and Fountains
- Serviced Apartment
- Fully Furnished
- Please Contact Devin Hipkin for more information on +971569418380 or email devin@hmshomes.com for further details and to arrange a viewing.
Upon entrance you are welcomed by a very wide hallway which leads left into the kitchen and right into the powder room.
Further forward you come to the very spacious living and dining room area, this has 2 points of access into the balcony.
Heading right you come to bedroom 3 & 4 and the Maid’s room along with the washer and dryer room.
Heading left from the living room you come to bedroom 2 equipped with balcony access and the master bedroom, equipped with balcony access ensuite and walk in closet.
All balconies have 2 points of access and link the rooms together.
All rooms have full Burj Khalifa and fountain views with panoramic Dubai views.']
